attributes.action: Overturn the veto that blocks publication of key records concerning the (illegal?) invasion of iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jack Straw has signed a certificate vetoing rulings by the Information Commissioner and Information Tribunal that key records should be disclosed, under the Freedom of Information Act, in relation to the pending invasion of iraq. As this conflict has not only cost vast amounts of both lives and money, it is a digrace for the taxpaying public not to be given full detail of the decisions that allowed us as a nation to became involved in this debacle.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
